member.summary: Determines if the returned document should be returned from cached resources if available.

member.summary: Determines a base document from the cache that should service as interactivity blueprint.
member.remarks: Applicable only when UseCache=true.

member.name: P:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.DocumentsArgs.ActionID
member.summary: Determines the server interactivity action that should be triggered over an existing document in order to generate the new document.
member.remarks: Applicable only when BaseDocumentID is provided.

member.returns: The UserIdentity object instance, that can be later retrieved by property or by using expression =UserIdentity

member.summary: Creates the mail message that will be used in SendDocument
member.param: The args to use in the mail message
The document to attach to the mail message

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.ReportsHostBase.SendMailMessage(System.Net.Mail.MailMessage)
member.summary: Sends an e-mail message containing a report document to its recipients. Override this method in order to effectively send the mail message.
member.remarks: The default implementation of this method is empty. Override this method in order to use the feature.
member.param: The mail message to send

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.ReportsHostBase.CreateReportResolver
member.summary: Creates an implementation instance that will be used for report resolving from the service
member.remarks: Override this method in order to create the report resolver instance. May be one of the built-in report resolvers or a custom implementation resolver. Built-in resolvers may be chained.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.ReportsHostBase.CreateCache
member.summary: Creates an implementation instance that will be used for internal storage from the service.
member.remarks: Override this method in order to create the cache instance. May be one of the built-in caching implementations or a custom implementation. To use one of the built-in caching implementations use the class.
member.returns: An instance of cache that will be used from the controller in order to preserve its cache/state.

member.name: M:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.ReportsHostBase.CreateStorage
member.summary: Creates an implementation instance that will be used for internal storage from the service.
member.remarks: Override this method in order to create the storage instance. May be one of the built-in storage implementations or a custom implementation.
member.returns: An instance of storage that will be used from the controller in order to preserve its cache/state.

member.name: P:Telerik.Reporting.Services.ServiceStack.ReportsHostBase.ReportServiceConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration of the report service.
member.remarks: When inheriting the ReportsControllerBase controller basic configuration is needed. Provide an object implementing the in order to configure the report service. This should be done in the controllers' constructor using static object to preserve the configuration between requests or using dependency injection.
member.example: This example shows how to configure WebAPI service using the object.
